issue.title: DRC Vehicle can't make sharp turns

content.raw: Please see pull request #278 and [gazebo_models pull request 38](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/38/polaris-rear-differential-parameter/diff). I've made several changes (wheel stiffness, added a rear differential for help on bumps). Note that grass has a lower friction coefficient, so your turning will not be quite as sharp as it is on the asphalt in vrc_task_1.
